How much should I tip on a drink?
It is a good rule of thumb to tip at least $1 per drink, or 15% on your total tab. You can also refer to our drink calculator if you want a specific percentage.
How much alcohol is in a drink?
For 1 US Standard Drink, there is approximately 14 grams of pure alcohol.
How quick will my body process alcohol?
The average metobolic rate for alcohol is 0.015 per hour.
I want to go out to a bar but I don't want to drink alcohol, what should I order?

You can order any popular Mocktail. If you do not see a drink fit to your craving, we suggest ordering any cocktail without the alcohol. As a substitute, use water in place of alcohol or ask your bartender what they suggest.
How often should you drink water when drinking alcohol?
You should use the 1-for-1 Rule. For each alcoholic drink you consume, drink one glass of water after.
Does the BAC Meter feature show my exact BAC level?
Our BAC Meter gives an approximation. This meter is not 100% and is used for educational purposes. Please refer to our disclaimer.
